channel.title: Adding shops error, will rep++
channel.description: I read this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,35951.0.html (Adding Shops) Did everything like it said, i even use testscape, but whenever i rightclick and try trading the shopkeeper, i get connection lost. Why is this? Will rep++ if problem solved.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 08:02:23 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 08:11:13 PM[/size][hr]:(
